h1_title: How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4
h2_title: How to Find the Purple Talismans in the Webbed Hollow
h3_title: Purple Talisman 3 - Relief of the Fallen Loong
content: Pass through the area covered in webbing, then follow the path, going up and around to the right. When you get to the top, you'll see a big tree and rock with twisted roots in it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Find_All_Purple_Talisman_Altars_in_Chapter_4.md', within the main section titled 'How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Purple Talismans in the Webbed Hollow' and the sub-subsection 'Purple Talisman 3 - Relief of the Fallen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Pass through the area covered in webbing, then follow the path, going up and around to the right. When you get to the top, you'll see a big tree and rock with twisted roots in it.
